Visibility: 1.6 km

Dewpoint: -20.2°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:35 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:35 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023
